description: An icy-blue glaes basin sits on a round, finely-carved tanik table placed at this room's exact center.  A heavy, cool mist billows off the water contained in the basin, making the room chill and damp.  Behind the basin is a tall marble statue fashioned to resemble Koar, with a medallion wrapped around its shoulders.  The walls are draped with heavy, blue tapestries.  The floor is bare stone, worn to almost icy smoothness by the passage of many booted feet.
title: [Ta'Illistim Gaol, Small Shrine]
